org.strongback.components

Interface Fuse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Switch

    @ThreadSafe
public interface Fuse
extends Switch
    A switch that is initially not triggered but that can be (manually or automatically) reset.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Fuse autoResetting(long delay, TimeUnit unit, Clock clock)
      Create a fuse that can be manually reset() but that will automatically reset after the given delay.
      static Fuse autoResetting(long delay, TimeUnit unit, Clock clock, Runnable whenTriggered)
      Create a fuse that can be manually reset() but that will automatically reset after the given delay.
      static Fuse create()
      Create a simple fuse that is manually triggered and manually reset().
      static Fuse instantaneous(Runnable whenTriggered)
      Create a simple fuse that is manually triggered and manually reset().
      Fuse reset()
      Reset the fuse so it is no longer triggered.
      Fuse trigger()
      Trigger the fuse.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.strongback.components.Switch

        alwaysTriggered, and, isTriggered, neverTriggered, or

    • Method Detail

      • trigger

        Fuse trigger()
        Trigger the fuse. Once this method is called, the Switch.isTriggered() switches but then will never change until it is reset().
        Returns:
        this object to allow for chaining methods together; never null

      • reset

        Fuse reset()
        Reset the fuse so it is no longer triggered.
        Returns:
        this object to allow for chaining methods together; never null

      • create

        static Fuse create()
        Create a simple fuse that is manually triggered and manually reset().
        Returns:
        the fuse; never null

      • instantaneous

        static Fuse instantaneous(Runnable whenTriggered)
        Create a simple fuse that is manually triggered and manually reset().
        Parameters:
        whenTriggered - the function that is to be called when the fuse is triggered; may be null
        Returns:
        the fuse; never null

      • autoResetting

        static Fuse autoResetting(long delay,
                          TimeUnit unit,
                          Clock clock)
        Create a fuse that can be manually reset() but that will automatically reset after the given delay.
        Parameters:
        delay - the time after the fuse is triggered that it should automatically reset; must be positive
        unit - the time units for the delay; may not be null
        clock - the clock that the fuse should use; if null, the system clock will be used
        Returns:
        the auto-resetting fuse; never null

      • autoResetting

        static Fuse autoResetting(long delay,
                          TimeUnit unit,
                          Clock clock,
                          Runnable whenTriggered)
        Create a fuse that can be manually reset() but that will automatically reset after the given delay.
        Parameters:
        delay - the time after the fuse is triggered that it should automatically reset; must be positive
        unit - the time units for the delay; may not be null
        clock - the clock that the fuse should use; if null, the system clock will be used
        whenTriggered - the function that is to be called when the fuse is triggered; may be null
        Returns:
        the auto-resetting fuse; never null
